import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './index.css' const ProductCard = props => { const {productData} = props const {title, brand, imageUrl, rating, price, id} = productData return (

  • {title}

    by {brand}

    Rs {price}/-

    {rating}

    • ) } export default ProductCard
